description: This version of the  Baby emoji has the  Medium Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Moderate Brown Skin Tone on supported platfor
apple_vendor_description: The baby emoji with medium skin tone on Apple devices is an epitome of adorable innocence, with chubby cheeks and wide, bright eyes that convey pure joy and wonder, all rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and gentle 3D shading. Its smooth skin texture and subtle highlights suggest a healthy, happy infant, evoking feelings of new beginnings, tenderness, and familial love. This endearing representation, distinctly styled by Apple, is perfect for celebrating life's milestones or expressing heartfelt affection.
